value:
No matter the outfit, wear it with
pride. If you hold your head high,
unkind comments roll off your back.

Who would have guessed I'd see my
family again like this? And that I'd
have a festival to thank for it...

I've got all the gifts I need. Ike
and Mist are all I could ask for.
Nothing could compare.

It's good to see so many smiling
faces. Gives you a little jolt of
energy, and keeps you moving.

It may be tempting to be gentle and
kind, but sometimes love means you
have to be strict.$k$pOh, don't listen to me...

I'm here on behalf of
$Nf.
Go help 'em out!

My kids are watching. I have to
give 'em a show.

Getting back into the
swing of things...
Whoops. Sorry about that.

Seems like you expect a lot from
me. I'd better deliver.

The name's Greil. I used to be a
mercenary commander. I hear that
Ike and Mist are here. That true?

As mercenaries, we fight and win.
We have to stay in perfect condition,
or we won't survive. That's the job.$k$pIf you do survive, all that fighting
wears on you. Believe me, I know!$k$pThere's no magic medicine that'll
heal that wear and tear on your heart.$k$pMoney, status, honor... They won't do
the trick either.$k$pIt's people who help. My comrades,
and more than that, my children...
They lift my spirits.$k$pIt's thanks to them that I can see a
path forward. I'm truly grateful to
them, from the bottom of my heart.
ふんっ！
いくぞ！
うああっ！
そうではなくてはな…
Here's a gift.
I like your resolve.
I need to survive.
I'll start us off.
I can do no more...
sigh
The name's Greil. I was the commander of a mercenary company, but... Well, I retired.
Seems I'm lost in a strange world...
Here, it's a gift. Take it. Look, I...I'm not so great at this kind of thing.
My son is a stubborn pup. But I guess I'm the one who made him that way...
I told Ike to forget about revenge, but...
I didn't want anybody dying on me. I ordered it. And then... Oh, Mist, I'm sorry.
We are family. If you don't want to cause your family any grief, then live!
Ah hah...
Well, well...
I'll survive.
